languages.text: "Я слышал об этих стеклах. Что в них колдовского? Любой дурак может при помощи увеличительного стекла разжечь огонь. Это еще не колдовство".
"I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
languages.original_text: "Я слышал об этих стеклах. Что в них колдовского? Любой дурак может при помощи увеличительного стекла разжечь огонь. Это еще не колдовство".

traits.locale_text: "I've heard about those glasses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire using a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
"I've heard about those glasses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire using a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
"I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
"I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
"I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."
"I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

languages.text: "Ich habe von diesen Linsen gehört. Was lässt Euch glauben, dass sie verzaubert sind? Jeder Narr kann mit einer Lupe ein Feuer entzünden. Das ist keine Hexerei."
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe von diesen Linsen gehört. Was lässt Euch glauben, dass sie verzaubert sind? Jeder Narr kann mit einer Lupe ein Feuer entzünden. Das ist keine Hexerei."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu parler de ces lentilles. Qu'est-ce qui vous fait dire qu'elles sont enchantées ? Le premier idiot venu peut allumer un feu avec une loupe. Ça n'a rien de sorcier. »
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu parler de ces lentilles. Qu'est-ce qui vous fait dire qu'elles sont enchantées ? Le premier idiot venu peut allumer un feu avec une loupe. Ça n'a rien de sorcier. »

languages.text: “我听说过那些镜片，但您为什么会认为它们有魔力？就连傻瓜都会用放大镜生火，那可不是什么巫术。”
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: “我听说过那些镜片，但您为什么会认为它们有魔力？就连傻瓜都会用放大镜生火，那可不是什么巫术。”

languages.text: 「そのレンズのことは聞いたよ。なぜ魔法などと？どんなバカでも虫眼鏡で火をつけることはできる。魔術などではない」
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: 「そのレンズのことは聞いたよ。なぜ魔法などと？どんなバカでも虫眼鏡で火をつけることはできる。魔術などではない」

languages.text: «He oído hablar de estas lentes. ¿Qué le hace pensar que están encantadas? Cualquier tonto puede encender un fuego con una lupa. Eso no es brujería».
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: «He oído hablar de estas lentes. ¿Qué le hace pensar que están encantadas? Cualquier tonto puede encender un fuego con una lupa. Eso no es brujería».

languages.text: "Bu mercekleri duymuştum. Efsunlu olduklarını nereden çıkardınız? Çocuklar bile büyüteçle ateş yakabilir. Buna sahirlik denemez."
languages.original_text: "I've heard about these lenses. What makes you think they're enchanted? Any fool can light a fire with a magnifying glass. That's no sorcery."

traits.locale_text: "Bu mercekleri duymuştum. Efsunlu olduklarını nereden çıkardınız? Çocuklar bile büyüteçle ateş yakabilir. Buna sahirlik denemez."
